thread.title: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra creates magic at red carpet
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra creates magic at red carpet

author: India TV Entertainment Desk
title: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra creates magic at red carpet
text:
Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra creates magic at red carpet Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra creates magic at red carpet The Quantico star Priyanka Chopra took everyone’s breath away with her stunning look at the 89th Academy Awards, which started at Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles. The Academy Awards turned into starry affair with   New Delhi [ Updated: 27 Feb 2017, 11:21:44] The Quantico star Priyanka Chopra took everyone’s breath away with her stunning look at the 89th Academy Awards, which started at Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles. 
The Academy Awards turned into starry affair with the arrival of Hollywood celebs on the red carpet in their best-ever look. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 26, 2017 at 7:50pm PST 
Desi girl, Priyanka Chopra, who is making headlines in Hollywood from quite some time now, captured all the eyeballs with her yet another stunning look in Oscars 2017. 
Bollywood actress, Priyanka Chopra, who is creating sensation in Hollywood these days, turned all the shutterbugs towards her in her fresh sexy avatar. The actress looked effortlessly beautiful as she graced the occasion in a Ralph and Russo column gown. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 26, 2017 at 3:34pm PST 
Priyanka opted for a slightly white look, which was paired with a drop earring and nude lipstick. Her chunky bracelet and sleek hair do, was simply an add-on to her look. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 26, 2017 at 1:15pm PST 
Interestingly, Indian girl, Priyanka Chopra, sported the Zuhair Murad creation at the Oscars Awards last year.
